events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their vehicle on the highway. They filed the initial claim today to start the process.
The claim was categorised under 'Auto Accident' after review of the accident description and related keywords in the report.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle this case, ensuring the customer receives prompt assistance for their car accident.
The claim has been officially acknowledged, and the customer was informed that the investigation will begin shortly.
The agent requested photos of the damaged vehicle, police report of the collision, and medical reports if applicable.
The customer submitted all requested documents, including vehicle damage photos and the official police collision report.
The claims team initiated a thorough investigation to verify details of the auto accident and assess the damage reported.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of the accident details, extent of vehicle damage, and validation of submitted documents.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer based on the repair cost estimates and policy coverage limits.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the timely handling of their claim and acceptance of the proposed settlement.
The claim was officially approved confirming the coverage for the car repairs and related costs due to the accident.
Payment was processed and issued to the customer for the approved amount to cover the vehicle repairs.
The claim has been formally closed after all payments were made and the case finalized to the customer's satisfaction.
The completed auto accident claim files were archived securely for future reference as per company policy.
